dialogue: This will be your biggest challenge yet, [color=hackerman]{name}[/color]! Let’s see if you can go 3 for 3.
The government?! So even more people will be affected?
Come on, it’s not like the Government are saints. Why feel bad?
You’ve never hesitated during your past jobs. Getting cold feet now, are we?
Of course not! I’ll get this job done as per usual.
That’s more like it! You’re going to need that mentality for this job, cause it is the hardest one yet.
It’s also the highest paying, wink wink.
Good luck... [color=whispher]You’re going to really need it this time[/color]
Even more people will be affected because of me? Well, I guess I have no choice...
There’s no telling what would happen if I miss out on paying the hospital bills again...
